thread.title: How to repackage junk food so hipsters will buy it (7 photos)
thread.title_full: How to repackage junk food so hipsters will buy it (7 photos)

author: Alex
title: How to repackage junk food so hipsters will buy it (7 photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Artist Dan Meth reimagined popular junk food as artisanal snacks hipsters would happily throw into the baskets attached to their handlebars. But knowing hipsters (our headquarters is based in Austin, after all) they’d still find something to turn their noses at. 2 
“Excuse me, was the fruit in these grown local?” 3 
“What farm were the Dunkaroos raised? How much room did they have to roam around?” 4 
“Who says ‘nerd’ anymore? What is this, an ’80s teen dramedy?” *readjusts nonprescription glasses* 5 
“Hmm… it doesn’t say ‘organic’ anywhere…” Advertisement
